description: [GoldenSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0493) has included a program "ExeProtector", which monitors for the existence of [GoldenSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0493) on the infected system and redownloads if necessary.(Citation: Trustwave GoldenSpy June 2020)

external_references.description: Trustwave SpiderLabs. (2020, June 25). The Golden Tax Department and Emergence of GoldenSpy Malware. Retrieved July 23, 2020.
